Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Brareviewer
Reviews.Content: Great camera, excellent zoom, loved the functions.If you decide to buy the intire kit, be aware that the case is not for this camera - actually it is twice or more the camera's size.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, heres the 411
Reviews.Author: Ruby
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera! i mean it takes great pictures and the setting are really easy!1) battery life does run low but id reccomend buying rechargeable batteries=) easy2)DO read the booklet manuel and dowload the disc onto your computer, the disk teaches you more than the booklet manuel does, it has so much more information on how to use your camera =)3)DO NOT USE the yellow wipe that comes with this set, it is to clean ur camera, it has fuzz and can get into the lens and you will have to send your camera off to get it fixed, id use a diff kind of material4) id buy a LCD screen protector =) just an option5) Overall this is a great camera and everything that was included was awesom!the case it comes with is perfect size and can fit in ur handbagg/purse *woman* and or you can just hang it over your shoulder... also its very protected cushion like. The usb device is AWESOM! you just put ur memory card at one end and connect the other end to your usb port and you have your pictures in seconds. This is a great seller=) thank you so much!6) take your time to play with your camera, get used to it and just have fun!

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Gator
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for its features, megapixles and mainly its optical zoom.  I also like the smallish size.  I have taken hundreds of pictures with it and really like the quality of them.  The quality of the camera is great.  I had to replace my last camera due to a malfunction in the lens.  Canon makes great equipment.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Scott V
Reviews.Content: The pictures are crisp and I love the control you have over the camera.  I haven't seen a camera for under $200 where you can control both aperture and shutter speed.  The flash is great - it determines how bright the flash should be so getting washed out pictures is rare and I have taken pictures across a dimly lit room and the exposure was almost perfect.The downside:  - The bag it was packaged with is a bit too big for me.  - It takes a little bit of time for the camera to process/save the pictures.  - It uses AA batteries so you need to buy rechargable NiMH batteries for the camera.Overall, a great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: djp332
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in anticipation of an Alaskan cruise this summer.  So far, I have taken pictures at our zoo and botanical garden, just to see how the camera works.  It is amazing.  The zoom lens is terrific!  I almost thought I was right in front of the elephants when I saw the pictures.  The camera actually knew when I was taking photos of flowers.  I could also see the craters in the moon when taking pictures of the super moon earlier this month.  I haven't had any issues with the batteries as I have been using rechargeable batteries.  I can't wait to see what it can do in Alaska.

Reviews.Title: good but could be improved
Reviews.Author: C Nelson
Reviews.Content: Pros: sharp photos, easy to use, good stabilization, fast cycle time, good focal lengthCons: no stich, easy to accidentally hit other buttons, no eyepiece

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Kristi
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  So easy to use.  On screen instructions, how can you go wrong?  Bought this item on Monday, was delivered on Thursday.  Great pics from Titans game.  Can't wait to use it in Florida this week.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: TimM
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be happier with the camera. My wife and I love it. It is easy to use and figure out. Love the quality of the video it shoots as well as the pictures (gets over 2000 pics on an 8 Gig card). Arrived on time and in great shape; would order from the vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Son loves his camera
Reviews.Author: Steven S.
Reviews.Content: Got this camera as a gift for my HS son. It was recommended by his teacher. My son really loves the camera with many features found on a higher end camera. Good price, good starter camera for the serious beginner.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, terrible battery life
Reviews.Author: Nicole Anderson
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome photos. Very happy with the photo quality and it is very user-friendly especially if you are not a professional photographer. The only negative comment I would have to say about the camera is the battery life. Last time I used it, I had put brand new batteries and by the end of the evening the camera was dead. Unfortunately, rechargeable batteries will not work in the camera. I am very irritated that I need to replace the batteries every time I want to use it!

Reviews.Title: You can't find a better deal!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I challenge you to find a better deal on this camera.  The extras are great.  The camera case is quite a bit bigger than it needs to be, but as a woman it's nice to have extra space in there for my wallet.  On trips the camera bag can act as my purse.  The 8 gb memory card and reader are AWESOME! All in all I'm very happy I made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: Jsalinas
Reviews.Content: I was surprised that the item got delivered quickly. It came to me 3 days before the expected day.. It was a gift and I can say that it was a nice surprise for the other person also.. Thank-you for your great service. I will continue to use you for future purchases..Jose S

Reviews.Title: This is a steal!!!
Reviews.Author: KobraK
Reviews.Content: This camera is more than great for the price. It's great for me and my wife as she like to take lots of pictures and really knows what to expect out of a camera if you want more than just a shoot-n-go. AUTO MODE is great for me as I just shoot-n-go. We went to Best Buy to look around for cameras and the prices were so high for cameras with the same features as this one. I love that you can get 45min of 720p HD video with the 8gb SD card included in the kit.I recommend this camera and really the whole kit. The kit is well worth it for $7(seller selling camera alone for $194) extra bucks despite the case being oversize. I recommend finding a soft sleeve for the camera when not in use. The LCD screen is huge.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Dealeeoohh!
Reviews.Author: R. Purdy
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera that does everything it was promoted to do. Very happy with it. Beach camera gave fantastic deal and I took them up on it to see if the first outrageous deal from them 4 years ago was a fluke or not. I was not disappointed in the least. Happy is as happy does! Thanks to Amazon and Beach for a wonderful Holiday season!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Siv
Reviews.Content: I bought this online in Amazon during thanks giving.  Its very nice, with excellent picture quality.  Its best in its class & better than Nikon (Which I used earlier)

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: rp
Reviews.Content: This camera bundle was a great buy. I have yet to use all the features on the camera, but I am quite pleased with the results thus far. I specifically liked that this particular bundle came with an 8GB memory card. Although mine did not come with the memory card, once I contacted the seller to see when they could send one out, as I was charged for this as part of the bundle, but they were able to refund my card that I used. I was satisfied with this result since they reacted with a great sense of urgency. I recommend this camera bundle, or even just the camera to those who are new to photograghy or just want a descent camera. Takes wonderful pictures, which is the ultimate reason why I settled on this particular camera.

Reviews.Title: Clear Nice Pictures.
Reviews.Author: Edward Carey
Reviews.Content: We love the pictures and easy of use of the camera.  The value pack is the way to go. Cannon cameras are always reliable.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot
Reviews.Author: Gay B. Treadwell
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera Love it love it. The case is way too big for this application so you might want to purchase a smaller case for it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot camera
Reviews.Author: Grass Roots Farmer
Reviews.Content: I have always been very pleased with Canon cameras, and this also is the case.  Although I have not used this much yet, it seems very user friendly and takes very sharp photos.  I am looking forward to putting this to the test on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: Great product and cheap price.
Reviews.Author: Riyaz
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. Its easy to use, very reliable and also cheap. Picture quality and features are great. I loved it...

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Cristina bastardo
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera to my mom in June, she is not very technological person .... and knew how to handle quickly. friendly. I recommend

Reviews.Title: IT WORKED BUT ITS BROKE ALREADY LESS THAN A YEAR
Reviews.Author: Michael M.
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS NICE AT FIRST BUT THE LCD SCREEN IS BROKE ALREADY. AND IT WAS NOT EVEN A YEAR. ITS DEFECTIVE

Reviews.Title: I Am Completely Sold On Canon for Compact Digital Point and Shoot Cameras.
Reviews.Author: Lee New "LapisLee"
Reviews.Content: I have owned the Canon A1000IS, SX120, SX130, SX150 and I am fairly certain I will own the SX160 soon. I have never paid more than $114 for any of these cameras in Like New condition and I typically use them for one to two years before selling them for approximately the same price I paid for them originally and upgrading to the newer model. The only thing I thought was a little tricky, and I guess I'm not that smart, is that on SX150 they gave the video feature it's own dedicated button on the upper back right of the camera, which I was confused by for a month or so. Now I think it's probably a good idea and only my friends are confused when I drunkenly shove the camera towards them and yell "Shoot a video of me!". :-)

Reviews.Title: Returned it
Reviews.Author: Robin Brooks
Reviews.Content: This camera did not work.  Tech support didn't know if it was a faulty picture card or a faulty camera.  I decided it was too big and bulky and not exactly what I needed.  In addition, all the box bling (small tripod, case, etc.) was not necessary.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, nice accessories
Reviews.Author: MarchFirst
Reviews.Content: I've owned two previous Canons and am familiar with how they generally work. This particular model is solid, durable, and has a nice zoom.  (the main reason I bought it: portability and better zoom capability than my smaller point-n-click Canon.The less-than-exciting surprise for me was that the flash must be manually raised.  So, even on the "Auto" flash setting, if you want it to consider flash, you must manually lift up the flash, the camera isn't designed/equipped for the flash to just pop up automatically.(No problems with the seller.)

Reviews.Title: Best camera
Reviews.Author: BIGB
Reviews.Content: This camera makes the best pictures.  You don't need to be a expert with this camera I love it.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great value camera and bundle for the price!
Reviews.Author: CL1212
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera mainly for it's macro function and I am happy to say that it doesn't disappoint.  Close up shots are amazingly detailed, clear and sharp.  I am just an average camera user and I sell fashion accessories so this Canon PowerShot is perfect for my needs.  It's easy to use and the photos come out great!  The table tripod comes in handy for many of my inventory shots.  If you are looking for a good easy-to-use digital camera and are on a budget, this Canon works!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camara
Reviews.Author: Elena
Reviews.Content: Highly recommended. I had a similar camara but this one its so much better. The pictures are captured at its best.  he combo works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pattycruiser
Reviews.Content: I wanted a heavier camera for my husband because he has rather large hands and this camera fit the bill.  It really takes excellent photos, however it is a bit bulky. You can always order the bundle and get an SD card or buy one separately. Whenever I find them on sale I always buy a bunch of them to have on hand when I travel.The photos come out vividly clear!  I like the fact that it uses AA batteries as they are universal. You can also pick up some rechargeables for a reasonable price along with a charger on Amazon.com as well.  Great camera for a good price.  I bought my husband a black one and I have the red one.  I am a camera junkie so I often buy, sell, trade, and give away a lot of cameras. I am considered the camera go to person on my job as I am always researching the newest cameras.

Reviews.Title: A Satisfied Buyer
Reviews.Author: Michaela
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this package. I was able to track it all the way to delivery and it arrived a day before the first estimated date online! :) Everything is great.A couple things that it is nice to know is that the tripod is a pocket size with flexible legs. It's about 4 inches. The camera case would hold about five of these cameras. On the bright side, this means you can hold all of your supplies for your camera in the case.Overall - a great buy. Very satisfied and elated. You could not find these products at this price with this great service any where else.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX150 IS Camera
Reviews.Author: tommurr
Reviews.Content: Product arrived prior to ETA.  Product is exactly as advertised.  It perfoms very well.  I would definitely do business with this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Not a Real Shutter Bug
Reviews.Author: Auntie B
Reviews.Content: Not only was the delivery amazing, with so many extras that made my bargain hunting nature very happy, but the camera's performance has been exactly as I had hoped.  Ease of operation key to someone who just likes to point and shoot, from bugs to birds, flowers and trees.  Just the right size to make carting it around easy but handling not so delicate.  I think Canon made this one for me.  Thrilled with the zoom capabilities and amazed at the auto focus that mysteriously knows what to focus on.  Very little reading to put it into action.  Can't truly vouch for the video or battery life since a month later, I'm still clicking furiously away with no indication that the batteries are low but I have not used the video functions.  This is a simple camera that captures my memories splendidly and all very easy on the bank account.  Thanks to Beach Camera for the perks and Amazon for the offer to allow using some vouchers up.  Its a great mid size camera for a non professional wildlife enthusiast.

Reviews.Title: Did not come with an SD card.
Reviews.Author: spasticbumblebee
Reviews.Content: This camera was bought for a friend, but when I received it, the SD card was not in the box. We haven't been able to use it yet, because of the limited storage of the camera itself without the SD card. I am very disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
12x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens
Optical Image Stabilizer
14.1 Megapixel Sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
Smart AUTO
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot SX150 IS 14MP Digital Camera with 12x Zoom Bundle (Black)
